title: Kirka.io
description: A block-style FPS with different game modes including team deathmatch, free-for-all, and capture the flag. Features a variety of weapons, character customization, and maps with a distinctive voxel aesthetic. Earn experience and currency to unlock new items and upgrades as you play.
how_to_play: Use WASD to move, Space to jump, and Shift to sprint. Mouse to aim and left-click to shoot. Press R to reload and Q for special abilities. Numbers 1-9 to switch weapons. On mobile, use the virtual joystick and buttons. Choose your preferred game mode and work with your team or dominate solo depending on the mode.
